title: BOC user views Deferred Comp Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has clicked on the Major Contracts Tab
custom_steps: WHEN the users clicks on the "Def Comp Funding" tab
custom_expected:
THEN the layout will match the wireframe and data discovery 
AND org will be defaulted to blank 

Wireframe: 
http://copbdc.axshare.com/#p=deferred_compensation_funding

Data Discovery: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2347746

title: BOC selects Org to view in deferred comp utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Deferred comp utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects and org and clicks View
custom_expected: THEN the page will refresh and display the Def Comp for the selected Org

title: Club user views Deferred Comp Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the club user has clicked on the Major Contracts Tab
custom_steps: WHEN the users clicks on the "Def Comp Funding" tab
custom_expected:
THEN the layout will match the wireframe and data discovery 
AND utility will default to logged in user's org

Wireframe: 
http://copbdc.axshare.com/#p=deferred_compensation_funding

Data Discovery: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2347746

title: BOC user views Exemption Details
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Deferred Comp Utility
custom_steps: WHEN they click on the View Details link
custom_expected:
THEN a popup will display the Exemption details for the current view of the screen
AND clicking outside the popup will close it

title: Club user views Exemption Details
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Deferred Comp Utility
custom_steps: WHEN they click on the View Details link
custom_expected:
THEN a popup will display the Exemption details for the current view of the screen
AND clicking outside the popup will close it

title: View the % funded in Deferred Comp Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Deferred Comp Utility
custom_steps: WHEN they view the Totals Section
custom_expected: THEN they will see % Funded by the Organization using the selected As of Date and discount Rate

title: View Deferred Comp Utility using a different Funding As Of date
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the deferred comp utility
custom_steps:
WHEN the user updates the Funding As of Date field 
AND clicks View
custom_expected: THEN the deferred comp utility will refresh the page to reflect the new date

title: View note reflecting current deadlines
custom_steps: WHEN viewing the note on the Deferred Comp Screen
custom_expected:
THEN 
* The Note will always detail when Funding certifications are due to the Commissioner's Office based off of the selected "Funding As Of" date. 
* Text will read "Funding certifications due to the Commissioner's Office by Date 1 (format ex: July 31, 2016); Date 2; Date 3; and Date 4
* Date 1 will be replaced  July 31, (year selected in funding as of filter); Date 2 will be replaced by October 31, (year selected in funding as of filter); Date 3 will be replaced by January 31, (year selected in funding as of filter + 1); and Date 4 will be replaced by April 30, (year selected in funding as of filter +1)  

*NOTE - last AC is how it works in ebis1. We have altered this slightly to reorder the dates and only showing dates occurring AFTER the entered as of date. (Ex: if funding as of is set to february 2018 it will read - Funding certifications due to the Commissioner's Office by 4/30/2018; 7/31/2018; 10/31/2018; and 1/31/2019) This is good for now and we will change later if users push back. *

title: View funding ranges being used on the Deferred comp funding utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Deferred Comp Utility
custom_steps: WHEN they click on the plus sign to expand the Funding Ranges section
custom_expected:
THEN the proper funding ranges will display 
AND The "with money earned no later than" column differs depending on the date being used to populate the deferred comp funding screen (the funding as of date)
AND Each line always shows MUST BE FUNDED at the end.
AND The note at the top always reads "Note: Contracts signed prior to 12/31/1985 do not need to be funded"

title: Club user views Deferred Comp Utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the club user has logged in 
AND has clicked Major Contracts from the Left nav tab
custom_steps: WHEN they click the Deferred Compensation Tab
custom_expected:
THEN the Club's Deferred Compensation funding utility will load 
AND The Org displayed will be locked to the Club user's Org (cannot view other Orgs). 
AND "Funding As Of" will default to July of the current year through July, and July of the following year through December. (Ex: In August 2016 this will read July 2017) 
AND Discount Rate is defaulted to 5%.

title: View player's details in the Deferred Comp funding screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Deferred Comp funding screen 
AND is viewing an Org's Deferred Comp
custom_steps: WHEN the user expands the row of a specific player
custom_expected: THEN expanding a row will display as many rows as are needed within that expansion to capture the information for the player, including all payment sources relevant to the current values entered into the Deferred Comp Funding screen.

title: As a user I want to view each payment source
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Deferred Comp Screen 
AND if viewing a specific's Org's Deferred Comp
custom_steps: WHEN they expand a Player row
custom_expected:
THEN the sources column will change from the number of sources when the row was unexpanded to listening out each payment source. 
AND the number of payment sources should match the number that displayed when the row was unexpanded 
AND Each Payment Source will display the Date, Amount and Present Value of the deferred compensation associated with that payment source. 
AND  Each player will also have a Payment Source labeled "Totals" that will display the total Amount deferred (Amt), the total amount funded as of the entered date (fnd) and the present value of the deferred comp (PV) and the present value of the funded deferred comp (Fnd PV).

title: View Deferred Comp Utility using a different discount rate
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the Deferred Comp utility for a specific org
custom_steps:
WHEN the user adjusts the discount rate with a valid entry ( can enter up to 99.999- System will not allow for any other) 
AND clicks View
custom_expected: THEN the page will refresh to reflect the new Discount rate

title: See note at the top of the deferred comp utility reflecting current deadlines
custom_steps: WHEN a user is viewing the Deferred Comp funding utility
custom_expected:
THEN they will see a note at the top of the page 
AND text will read "Funding certifications due to the Commissioner's Office by Date 1 (format ex: July 31, 2016); Date 2; Date 3; and Date 4
AND Date 1 will be replaced  July 31, (year selected in funding as of filter); Date 2 will be replaced by October 31, (year selected in funding as of filter); Date 3 will be replaced by January 31, (year selected in funding as of filter + 1); and Date 4 will be replaced by April 30, (year selected in funding as of filter +1)  

*NOTE - last AC is how it works in ebis1. We have altered this slightly to reorder the dates and only showing dates occurring AFTER the entered as of date. (Ex: if funding as of is set to february 2018 it will read - Funding certifications due to the Commissioner's Office by 4/30/2018; 7/31/2018; 10/31/2018; and 1/31/2019) This is good for now and we will change later if users push back. *

title: Funding As of Date will be dropdowns
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Deferred Comp Utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the Funding As of Field
custom_expected:
THEN  the "Funding As Of" field on the Deferred Comp utility should actually be composed of 1 dropdown and a year field, not a datepicker.
AND  the first dropdown should contain the available months - January, April, July and October. 
AND The year field should allow the entry of a valid year (must be 4 whole numbers)

title: Update deferred comp calculations to reflect new interpretation of rules
custom_preconds: GIVEN rules have been reinterpreted around Deferred Compensation that is payable outside guaranteed years
custom_steps: WHEN user views Deferred Comp Utility
custom_expected:
THEN utility should be updated to reflect this new rule so that option years are no longer considered guaranteed for the purposes of deferred comp
AND this change should be effective dated (as of July 2016)

title: View Add transaction button
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user if viewing a Payroll Report
custom_steps: WHEN the Payroll report is in Edit mode
custom_expected: THEN an "Add Transaction" button displayed beneath the Cash Transactions portion of the utility (see wire).

title: Click Add Transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user if viewing a Payroll Report in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Add Transaction
custom_expected: THEN a popup will launch that allows the user to select the Payor, Payee, Transaction Date and Amount that are associated with the transaction.

title: Add a transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has completed all required fields on the Add transaction Popup [C187387]
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Add transaction that becomes active only when all required fields have been completed
custom_expected: THEN the modal will close and populate the Cash Transaction table of BOTH the LRD and the CBT payroll report utility with the cash transaction information for the currently selected Org.

title: Check that counterpart of transaction is also added to the other org
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has successfully added a cash transaction to a payroll report 
AND for example if Payor is ARI and Payee is BOS for a transaction of 1,00,000
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the payroll report for ARI and BOS
custom_expected: THEN ARI will have that amount subtracted from their totals while BOS will have it added

title: Reset manually changed values
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has manually updated Player Details in a Payroll Report 
AND is in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Reset in a Player's row
custom_expected: THEN clicking the reset button will restore the originally calculated values to the Payroll details for the selected player.

title: Add Player to Payroll Report
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user if viewing a Payroll Report 
AND is in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Add Player
custom_expected:
THEN a modal is launched that matches the wireframe 
AND the Player dropdown works like quicksearch

title: Player is added to CBT and LRD version of the report
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has clicked Add player on a Payroll Report
custom_steps:
WHEN the user has filled out all required fields in the modal 
AND clicked Add Player
custom_expected: THEN  the player and the information added for him, are added to both the CBT and LRD version of the current report.

title: Cancel Addition of player
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has clicked Add Player on a Payroll Report
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Cancel on the modal
custom_expected: THEN the modal will be dismissed and no player will be added to the report

title: Remove Player from Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a Payroll Report in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the trashcan icon
custom_expected:
THEN the player is flagged as being removed from the report 
AND the player will remain in the utility but be greyed out 
AND Return button appears where the trash can icon was

title: Save Removal of Player from Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has removed a player from the report [C187401]
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Save
custom_expected:
THEN Deleted will appear in the "Manually Changed" column 
AND the player will appear in the utility but will NOT display in the actual report

title: Return a deleted player to the Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has removed a player from the report [C187402]
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Return button for a player
custom_expected:
THEN the player and their information will be restored to the report
AND the row will no longer be greyed out

title: Save the return of a deleted player to the Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has returned a player that was previously deleted from a payroll report [C187404]
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Save
custom_expected:
THEN the report is loaded in view mode 
AND Deleted will not appear in the "Manually Changed Column" 
AND the player will now display in the actual report and in the utility 
AND the row will no longer be greyed out

title: Cancel changes to payroll report
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a payroll report in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user makes changes to the report and clicks Cancel
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be asked to confirm they wish to lose any edits that have been made to the utility 
IF they confirm, any edits will be cancelled out and the report will load in view mode 
IF they do not confirm, THEN they will be returned to the report they were working on

title: View Close button
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has generated a payroll report or is viewing an existing saved report
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Close (only appears in view mode)
custom_expected: THEN the user is taken back to the original screen with all of the previously selected filters blanked out

title: LRD user views total LRD 40 Man Impact excluding cash transactions
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing Payroll Report
custom_steps: WHEN the LRD is selected for Show dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN Total LRD 40-Man Impact displays under the payroll section 
AND is recalculated on Save when updates are made to values in the table

title: LRD user views total CB Tax Impact excluding cash transactions
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user if viewing Payroll Report
custom_steps: WHEN the CBT is selected for Show dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN Total CB Tax Impact displays under the payroll section 
AND is recalculated on Save when updates are made to values in the table

title: View CB tax Payroll Cash Transaction details
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a Payroll Report
custom_steps: WHEN CBT is selected in the Show dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN the Cash transaction section should match the wireframe 
http://copbdc.axshare.com/#p=payroll_report

title: View LRD 40- Man Payroll Cash Transaction details
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a Payroll Report
custom_steps: WHEN LRD is selected in Show dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN the Cash transaction section will match the wireframe 
http://copbdc.axshare.com/#p=payroll_report

title: View which rows were manually updated
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user if viewing a Payroll Report
custom_steps:
WHEN the user manually updates a Player's Details in the Payroll section of the utility 
AND clicked Save
custom_expected: THEN a green check will appear in the Manually Changed Column in View mode

title: View Reset button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has manually made changes to a Player's Details in a Payroll report 
AND has saved those changes
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Edit
custom_expected: THEN a Reset button will appear in the rows that were manually edited

title: Add multiple players to new Cash Transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an LRD user is logged in and viewing a Cash Transaction
AND user has clicked "Add Transaction" to launch popup that allows the user to select the Payor, Payee, Transaction Date and Amount
AND a dropdown that contains the same population of players that is contained in the "Add player" modal, along with their current Org/Club (if any) and roster status, is available
AND "Add Row" button is available in the modal
custom_steps: WHEN user Clicks Add Row button
custom_expected: THEN system should add an additional player dropdown to the modal with the same population of players

title: Remove multiple players from a new Cash Transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an LRD user is logged in and viewing a Cash Transaction
AND one or more players has already been added to the transaction
AND trash can icon is visible on each row associated with a player
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the trash can icon
custom_expected:
THEN system should remove the row and associated player from the modal
AND clicking "Add Transaction" should close the modal, and add the transaction details, along with a semicolon separated list of player names to the Cash Transactions table
AND players should appear as Last, Roster First

title: Use Opening Day Saved Special Rosters as player population on CBT Reports
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has selected a MN player to the ML roster 
AND has created a contract for the player
custom_steps: WHEN the player saves the Opening day rosters
custom_expected: THEN the player will appear in the Payroll report utility

title: Remove player that was manually added from Payroll Report Utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an LRD user is logged in and viewing Payroll Report Utility in edit mode
AND each row in Payroll section of the report for both CBT and LRD have a trash can icon available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the trash can icon
custom_expected:
THEN system should flag the player as being removed from the report if they were not manually added to the report
AND system should remove the players that were manually added to the report from the utility
AND the delete should not be effective until the payroll report has been saved
AND the deleted player(s) should NOT display in the actual report

title: Edit Players associated with existing Cash Transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an LRD user is viewing the Payroll Report Utility in edit mode 
AND there is at least one cash transaction in the Cash Transactions table
AND an "Edit Players" button is available for each populated row
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Edit Players"
custom_expected:
THEN system should launch a modal that displays relevant cash transaction information in view mode, along with a list of players that currently exist in entered transaction
AND each player should appear in their own dropdown
AND the dropdown should have the same population as that of the Add Player modal
AND if more than one row exists, there should be a trash can icon for each row
BUT if only one row exists, there should be no trash can icon
AND clicking the trash can icon should remove the associated row from the modal
AND user should see an "Add Row" button that should add additional rows of players when clicked
AND the modal should have an Update button and a Cancel button
AND clicking cancel should cancel any of the changes made, close the modal and return the user to the payroll report utility in edit mode
AND the update button should not be enabled until each of the currently entered rows has a player selected
AND clicking update should close the modal and return the user to the Payroll Report Utility in edit mode, with the updated list of players displayed in the Cash Transactions utility
AND no edits should be saved until the entire report is saved

title: LRD can delete a cash transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN an LRD user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to Payroll Report Utility in Edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN there should be a trash can icon for each of the Cash Transactions being displayed
AND clicking the trash can should remove the associated Cash Transaction from the screen
AND user should be required to click "Save" in order for this to change to be saved
AND there should be no way to recover removed Cash Transactions

title: Payroll Report Utilities Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN accessing and updating the Payroll Report Utility is a permission set that can be added to an existing user
custom_steps:
WHEN a user (LRD - Contracts - Admin role group, by default) with this permission set logs in 
AND user navigates to Major Contracts Dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN "Payroll Reports" tab should appear on the Major Contracts Dashboard
AND user should be able to access and update Payroll Report Utility 
BUT users without this permission should not be able to see "Payroll Reports" tab
AND users without this permission should not be able to view the utility anywhere in the system

title: LRD receives error generating new Payroll Report for time period for which no saved roster exists
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an LRD user is logged in
AND user has navigated to Payroll Report Utility
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects "New"
AND user selects a value for "Save As" for which no saved roster exists for the year selected
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error message "{year} {Save As} value Rosters have not yet been saved." 
AND "Back" should be the only option available on the error

title: User sees cash tx from Trades and Waiver Claim Assignments on CBT Report Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions for the Payroll Report Utility
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to Cash Transactions Table on Payroll Report Utility 
AND user has selected an Org and Year
AND one or more Trades or Waiver claim assignments exist that impact selected org's payroll or CBT calc for the selected "As Of" date
custom_expected:
THEN the table should automatically be populated with any Cash Considerations from trades or waiver claim assignments that impact selected Org's Payroll or CBT calculations for selected Year
AND logic should match ebis1 with the exception of the changes detailed with the new CBA captured in the story #129837555
AND "From" Org should be mapped to the "Payor" in the Cash Considerations table
AND "To" Org should be mapped to the "Payee" in the Cash Considerations table
AND The Players included in the trade should be listed in the "Players" section
AND If there is a "Player to be named" then that text should also appear in the Players section of the Cash Considerations table
AND The dollar amount of the Cash Consideration should be reflected accurately

title: View existing Saved Payroll Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Payroll Utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a Year and selects anything OTHER than "New"
custom_expected:
THEN the View button becomes active 
AND clicking View will load the saved report

title: Generate a New Payroll Report
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Payroll Utility 
AND has selected a Year and "New" for Type [C182117]
AND has completed the "As of" and "Save As" fields 
AND the Generate Button is now active
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Generate
custom_expected:
THEN  Clicking Generate will generate the CBT Impact Player Details Report, and the LRD Impact Player Details report and display the report in the utility, per the wireframe (styling and other specifics to be handled in follow up stories). 
AND CBT Impact Player Details will be displayed by default. 

AND Wireframe:
http://copbdc.axshare.com/#p=payroll_report

title: LRD User Edits Payroll Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a Saved or newly generated Payroll Report
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Edit
custom_expected:
THEN the form will load in edit mode 
AND all filters will become disabled 
AND only the totals and any rows associated with players that have been removed will not be editable. All other fields will be editable

title: LRD User Saves changes to a Payroll Report
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has made edits to a Payroll Report [C182455]
AND is still in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Save
custom_expected:
THEN all entered values will be saved 
AND the form will load in view mode 
AND a successful blue notification will display

title: Access Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the BOC (test_boc_approver@mlb.com) user has clicked Major Contracts from left navigation
custom_steps: WHEN they click on the Payroll Forecast tab that displays
custom_expected: THEN the utility will load and display the Year, Show, and Org dropdowns

title: Default Dropdowns for Payroll Forecast
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user first views the dropdowns
custom_expected:
THEN the dropdowns  should default as follows: 

1. Year dropdown has the current year and the next 10 years contained in the dropdown, and defaults to the following year. (Ex: Right now in 2016 it would start at 2016 and go out to 2026, but default to 2017). 
2. Show dropdown contains All Players and Manually Modified Only options, and defaults to "All Players". 
3. Org defaults to "All", and has All and each of the 30 Orgs as an option.

title: View Payroll Forecast
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects values for each dropdown 
AND clicks the activated View button
custom_expected:
THEN the utility will load and display the selected criteria 
AND the top filters will remain editable with "View" button still enabled

title: View CB Tax Payroll Player details in the Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is viewing a Payroll Forecast report
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects CBT in the show dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN the CB Tax Player details report values will load 
AND the Payroll section of the CB Tax Payroll Forecast will be displayed when the header is set to CBT

title: Layout detail when CBT is selected in Show
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a Payroll Forecast Report
custom_steps:
WHEN CBT is selected in show drop down 
AND user is viewing CB Tax Player Details Report Values
custom_expected:
THEN Player name should be displayed as Last, First and should be a hyperlink to the player's player history. 
AND Payroll section should be sorted by player name (Last, First). 
AND Values in each column should be populated according to the report specifications pulled from ebis1.
AND Org should be the Org that the player's details are impacting for the report - not necessarily the Org that the player is currently affiliated with.  
AND guaranteed column only displays if MLS is < 3.000

title: View specific Org's LRD or CBT Payroll Forecast
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user if viewing Payroll Forecast report
custom_steps:
WHEN the user changes the value of the Org column 
AND clicks View
custom_expected:
THEN the screen should refresh to display the data for the newly selected Org 
AND both the Payroll and Cash Transactions section will update to reflect the selected org

title: View LRD 40-Man Payroll Player details in Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is viewing a Payroll Forecast report
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects LRD in the show dropdown
custom_expected: THEN the screen will refresh and display the LRD values of the report

title: View Cash Transactions in Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_steps: WHEN the header filter is set to LRD or CBT
custom_expected:
THEN Cash Transactions section of the Forecast report will display 
AND will be sorted by Payor, then Payee and then transaction date 

IF no cash transactions exist hide the table headers and show "No cash transactions"

title: See total value of displayed Cash Transactions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an LRD user is logged in
AND user is viewing Cash Transactions section of Payroll Report Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user sets "Show" to either LRD or CBT
custom_expected:
THEN Total Cash Transactions should display in Cash Transactions section
AND total should be calculated correctly per ebis1, taking into account all of the values entered into the utility
AND total should be recalculated on load of the report taking into account the selected filters, and on Save

title: Edit Payroll Forecast utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an LRD user is logged in and viewing Payroll Forecast Utility
AND edit button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks edit button
custom_expected:
THEN system should reload the form in edit mode
AND all of the filters should become disabled
AND the "View" button at the top of the page should also be disabled or not display
AND Payroll details section should be displayed in edit mode, per the wireframe
AND the only values that should not be editable in the Payroll details are the totals and any rows associated with players that have been removed
(Additional values that cannot be edited are detailed in the story #125729051.LABELS)

title: Add new Cash Transactions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as LRD user
AND user is viewing the Payroll Forecast Utility in edit mode
AND "Add Transaction" button is displayed beneath the Cash Transactions portion of the utility
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Add Transaction"
custom_expected:
THEN system should launch a popup that allows the user to select the Payor, Payee, Transaction Date and Amount that are associated with the transaction
AND an "Add Transaction" button should become enabled when all of the required fields have been entered properly
AND clicking this "Add Transaction" button should close modal, and populate Cash Transaction table of BOTH LRD and CBT payroll report utility with cash transaction information for selected Org
AND the reverse of the transaction shhould also be added to the counterpart's cash transactions table so that for one it appears as a positive, and the other as a negative. (Ex: If Payor is ARI and Payee is BOS for a transaction of 1,00,000, then ARI will have that amount subtracted from their totals while BOS will have it added)
AND if the filter is set to "All" then the cash transaction should only be displayed once

title: Save changes to Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as LRD user
AND user is viewing the Payroll Report Utility in edit mode
AND "Save" button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save"
custom_expected:
THEN system should save all of the entered values, and reload the utility in View mode
AND successful blue notification should display

title: Cancel changes to Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as LRD user
AND user is viewing Payroll Forecast Utility in edit mode
AND "Cancel" button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Cancel"
custom_expected:
THEN system should ask the user to confirm that they wish to lose any edits that have been made to the utility
AND confirming should cancel out any edits that have been made since the utility was placed into edit mode 
AND the utility should be reloaded in view mode

title: See total Forecasted CBT Payroll excluding Cash Transactions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as LRD user
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to Payroll Section of Payroll Forecast Utility 
AND sets "Show" to "CBT"
custom_expected:
THEN Forecasted CBT Payroll (Excluding Cash) should display under the Payroll section
AND Total should be calculated correctly per ebis1, taking into account all of the values entered into the utility
AND Total should be recalculated on generation of the report, and on Save

title: View which rows have been manually updated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as LRD user
AND changes to a player's details have been manually modified in the Payroll section of Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to Payroll Section of Payroll Forecast Utility in edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN a "Reset" button should appear in the row associated with the player whose details were changed 
AND once changes have been saved a green check should appear in view mode

title: Revert back to calculated values for manually modified rows
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as LRD user
AND details for one or more players have been manually modified in Payroll section of Payroll Report Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to Payroll Report Utility in edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN "Reset" button should be available for any row has been manually modified (not including added or deleted)
AND clicking the reset button should restore the originally calculated values for the selected player
AND the change should not take effect until the Payroll Forecast utility is actually saved

title: Add player to Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as LRD user
AND user has navigated to Payroll Forecast Utility in edit mode
AND "Add Player" button is available underneath the Payroll section of CBT or LRD Payroll Report
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Add Player"
custom_expected:
THEN system should launch a modal
AND Player dropdown should match the population of Quick Search
AND the "Add/Trade Player" button should be disabled until all required fields have been entered
AND he Cancel button should always be available
AND  when"Cancel" is clicked system should dismiss the modal without making any changes to the Payroll Report
AND when "Add/Trade Player" is clicked, the player and the information added for him, should be added to both the CBT and LRD version of the current report
AND the manually changed column should read "Added" in both view and edit mode

title: Remove a player from Payroll Forecast Utility - player NOT manually added
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as LRD user
AND user has navigated to Payroll section of the Payroll Forecast Utility in edit mode
AND a trash can icon is available in each row in the Payroll section for both  CBT and LRD
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks the trash can icon on a row for a player
AND player was NOT manually added to the report
custom_expected:
THEN system should flag the player as being removed from the report 
AND in the utility, the player should remain in the Payroll section, 
BUT player should be greyed out
AND the trash can icon should be replaced with a "Return" button in edit mode
AND "Deleted" should appear in the "Manually Changed" column in both view and edit mode
AND the delete should not be effective until the payroll report has been saved
AND the deleted player should remain visible in the utility, 
BUT player should NOT display in the actual report
AND

title: Remove a player from Payroll Forecast Utility - player manually added
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as LRD user
AND user has navigated to Payroll section of the Payroll Forecast Utility in edit mode
AND a trash can icon is available in each row in the Payroll section for both CBT and LRD
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks the trash can icon on a row for a player
AND player was manually added to the report
custom_expected:
THEN system should remove the player from the utility
AND the delete should not be effective until the payroll report has been saved
AND the deleted player(s) should NOT display in the actual report

title: See correct MLS on Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged with permission to access Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_expected: THEN "MLS" column should display player's current MLS as of the time of utility being loaded

title: Payroll Forecast Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN accessing and updating the Payroll Forecast Utility is a permission set that can be added to an existing user
custom_steps:
WHEN a user (LRD - Contracts - Admin role group, by default) with this permission set logs in 
AND user navigates to Major Contracts Dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN Payroll Forecast tab should appear on the Major Contracts Dashboard
AND user should be able to access and update Payroll Forecast Utility 
BUT users without this permission should not be able to see "Payroll Forecast" tab
AND users without this permission should not be able to view the utility anywhere in the system

title: LRD can delete a cash transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN an LRD user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to Payroll Forecast utility in Edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN there should be a trash can icon for only manually added Cash Transactions being displayed
AND clicking the trash can should remove the associated Cash Transaction from the screen
AND user should be required to click "Save" in order for this to change to be saved
AND there should be no way to recover removed Cash Transactions

title: Trade a player within Payroll Forecast Utility without selecting him first
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an LRD user is logged in
AND user has navigated to the Payroll Forecast Utility
AND "Add Player" button is visible
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Add Player"
custom_expected:
THEN system should launch a modal 
AND selecting a player in the Player dropdown that already appears in the Forecast Utility should pre-populate the modal with the player's information
AND user should not be able to select a new player
BUT user should be able to edit the salary information
AND "Add/Trade Player" button should be disabled until all required fields have been entered
AND cancel button should always be available, and when clicked should dismiss the modal without making any changes to the Payroll Report
AND when "Add/Trade Player" is clicked, the player and the information entered for him, should be added to both the CBT and LRD version of the current report for the Org selected in the modal, with "Traded from ORG" in the manually changed column
AND player should appear greyed out when viewing the Org that the player originated from with the text "Traded to ORG" in the manually changed column in View mode

title: LRD adds player not in the system to payroll forecast utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN an LRD user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Payroll Forecast Utility screen
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to enter text in the "Player" field in the Add/Trade Player modal
AND the utility should still allow for the selection of existing players
AND Text should NOT be treated as a hyperlink
BUT Player names that exist in the system should continue to appear as a hyperlink

title: LRD user adds player not in the system to details of cash tx for payroll forecast utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an LRD user is logged in
AND user has navigated to the Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Cash Considerations Portion of the Forecast Utility
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to enter text in the "Players" field in the modal, and still allow for the selection of existing players
AND text should be comma separated just as the players are, but NOT treated as a hyperlink
BUT Player names should continue to appear as a hyperlink

title: User sees cash tx from Trades and Waiver Claim Assignments on Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions for the Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to Cash Transactions Table on Payroll Forecast Utility 
AND user has selected an Org and Year
AND one or more Trades or Waiver claim assignments exist that impact selected org's payroll or CBT calc for the selected year
custom_expected:
THEN the table should automatically be populated with any Cash Considerations from trades or waiver claim assignments that impact selected Org's Payroll or CBT calculations for selected Year
AND logic should match ebis1 with the exception of the changes detailed with the new CBA captured in the story #129837555
AND "From" Org should be mapped to the "Payor" in the Cash Considerations table
AND "To" Org should be mapped to the "Payee" in the Cash Considerations table
AND The Players included in the trade should be listed in the "Players" section
AND If there is a "Player to be named" then that text should also appear in the Players section of the Cash Considerations table
AND The dollar amount of the Cash Consideration should be reflected accurately

title: As an LRD user I want to be able to print the Forecast Utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an LRD user is viewing the Payroll Forecast Utility
AND there is a "Print" button available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Print
custom_expected:
THEN system should run the Payroll Forecast Utility report with the same criteria as are currently selected on screen
AND the report should run successfully just as if it had been run directly from the Reports widget

title: Payments Tab Notification - calculated values changed for manually modified payment
custom_preconds: GIVEN an LRD user in the permission group: LRD - Contracts - Admin is logged in
custom_steps: When the system updates any value for a payment that has been manually modified on the payments tab
custom_expected:
THEN LRD user should receive a notification stating that a manually modified value has been changed
AND the notification's description should read: "Payment Tracking - Overwrote manually modified payments"
AND  notification description should be a hyperlink to the affected Contract

title: Payments Tab Notification - if payment source disappears in contract update for a manually modified payment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an LRD user in the permission group: LRD - Contracts - Admin is logged in 
AND a contract exists containing a Payment Source for which there exists manually modified payments
custom_steps: WHEN changes are made to a contract that entirely remove the Payment Source
custom_expected:
THEN LRD user should receive a notification
AND  description should read: "Payment Tracking - No longer calculating a payment which had manually modified values"
AND description should be a hyperlink to the affected Contract

title: As an LRD user I want players added to the saved CBT Payroll as 'COVID Credit' to be included on the Multi Year Payroll Player Details report.
custom_preconds: If a player is added to the saved CBT payroll with the new 'COVID Credit' wage type ([PIVOTAL-611]) then they should display on the CBT version of the Multi Year Player Details report with: ' - COVID Credit' appended to their name and the base wage value will match the value entered on the utilityAC:* Players added as COVID Credits appear on the CBT Payroll Details report* COVID Credit is appended to the player's name* All totals reflect the additions of COVID Credit

title: As an LRD user I want players added to the saved CBT Payroll as 'COVID Credit' to be included on the Payroll Team Details report.
custom_preconds: If a player is added to the saved CBT payroll with the new 'COVID Credit' wage type ([PIVOTAL-611]) then they be included on the CBT version of the Team Details report.  If any team has a player with a COVID Credit there will be a new column which displays the total for that team.  If no team has a covid credit then this column will not be displayed.AC:* There will be a new COVID Credits column on the Payroll - Team Details CBT report when ANY team has a player with a COVID Credit.* Players added as COVID Credits are counted under their teams COVID Credits column (with a negative value)* All totals reflect the additions of the COVID Credit

title: As an LRD User I want there to be a new system value: "CBT Base COVID Credit"
custom_preconds: There will be a new system value added to the system values screen called "CBT Base COVID Credit"If this value is entered for a year:* It will show up as a line item on the CBT version of the Payroll - Player Details report beneath the 'Extended Benefits' line item, the value entered should be negative.* It will show up as a new column on the CBT Version of the Payroll - Team Details report, after the Extended Benefits column* It will show up as a new line item on the CBT Version of the Multi-Year Report - Player details for all years.  Any year without a value will show up with a 0* It will be included in the totals for any year where a value is entered on the CBT Version of the Multi-Year Report - Team DetailsIf this value is NOT entered, the row and column will not appear on their respective reportsAC:* There is a new CBT Base COVID Credit system value which can be entered and saved correctly* If the value is saved, it appears as described above on the Payroll - Player, Team Details reports, Multi-Year Report - Player Details and Team details.* If the value is not saved or is zero then it will not appear on the payroll player detail report* If the value is not saved or is zero then it will not appear on the payroll team detail report - unless there are actual player specific COVID credits entered for the year* If any year in the multi years 8 year range has a value, a line item will appear on the multi year player details.  In this case, years without a value will display 0* Multi year team details totals will reflect covid credits appropriately* All totals should reflect the addition of the base credit

title: As an LRD user I want players added to the saved CBT Payroll as 'COVID Credit' to display on the player details report.
custom_preconds: If a player is added to the saved CBT payroll with the new 'COVID Credit' wage type ([PIVOTAL-611]) then they should display on the CBT version of the Player Details report with: ' - COVID Credit' appended to their name with the value entered on the payroll report utilityAC:* Players added as COVID Credits appear on the CBT Payroll Details report with the correct value* COVID Credit is appended to the player's name* All totals reflect the additions of COVID Credit

title: As an LRD user I want to be able to add a 'COVID Credit' to a saved CBT Payroll
custom_preconds: On the Major Contracts->Payroll Reports utility the user can add a new player to a saved payroll.  If the payroll type selected is CBT then one of the Wage Type selections will be 'COVID Credit'.Adding a player with this value and saving the payroll should correctly add the row.The value will always be a negative number (but there is nothing enforcing this)AC:* User is able to add a new COVID Credit row for a player to the CBT Payrolls on the Payroll Report utility

title: The MN minimum salary system values need to be split into two, one for CBT and one for LRD
custom_preconds: The minimum minor league salaries system value used by the payroll calculations needs to be split into two values, one for LRD and the one for CBTThe existing value:Minimum Minor League Salaryshould be changed to:Minimum Minor League Salary LRDAnd a new values should be added called:Minimum Minor League Salary CBTIf only the LRD value is entered, that should be used in the calculations for BOTH CBT and LRD, however if the values are different then the correct value should be used (If neither is used than the default minimum of 52600 is used)This comes into play in the calculations for players like Taylor Jones ([https://ebis.mlb.com/ebisui/#/major-contract/payroll?mjcId=31005102&playerId=370451)|https://ebis.mlb.com/ebisui/#/major-contract/payroll?mjcId=31005102&playerId=370451)] who are signed to an MN split, but are recalled and optioned again.Another example (so far the only other example this year): Jake Woodford (STL)
